titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University MS Or 475: Subḥat al-abrār.

availability.licence: These images and the content of Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 475: Subḥat al-abrār. are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. See the Creative Commons Public Domain Mark page for usage details, http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/.

To the extent possible under law, Columbia University, Rare Book & Manuscript Library has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this metadata about Rare Book and Manuscript Library MS Or 475: Subḥat al-abrār.. This work is published from: United States. For a summary of CC0, see https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. Legal code: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/legalcode.

msContents.summary: Illustrated copy of most of Subḥat al-abrār from Haft awrang on colored leaves, pink, yellow, cream. The selection begins with the fifth line of section 7 and continues through the end.

supportDesc.extent: 100 foliated leaves : 204 x 117 (120 x 60) mm, bound to 208 x 120 mm

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black ink; pointed.

decoDesc.decoNote: illuminated headpiece and finispiece in blue with gold, green, red and white (f. 1v, 100r); textblock border-ruled in gold and blue with columns and section headings ruled in gold; rubrications in gold and blue. Eight full-page illustrations (f. 9r, 27v, 39v, 44r, 51r, 61v, 81r, 91v).

origin.p: Item is undated, but probably produced in the 18th century.

history.provenance: Gift of Margaret L. Kempner in memory of Alan H. Kempner, 1986.
